LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[R] No trains running[4] [E] [M] [N] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service<br></b>Late Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Dec 11 - 15<br><br>[SB] Buses make all stops in Brooklyn, between 59 St and 95 St-Bay Ridge.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  width=70%><tr><td><font size=3><b>Travel Alternatives</b></font><td align=center>[TP]</table><br></font>For late evening service in Queens and Manhattan, take the [E] or [M].<br><br>For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [F]. <br>Transfer to/from the [M] at 34 St-Herald Sq or the [E] at W 4 St.<br>Take the [F] to Jay St-MetroTech where [N] service is available.<br><br>For Lower Manhattan and service <i>to/from</i> Brooklyn, take the [4] at nearby stops.<br><br>For Brooklyn stations between Court St and 59 St, take the [N] instead.<br><br> </font>Transfer between [N] trains and [SB] buses at 59 St.<br><br><font size=3><b><a style="cursor:pointer; text-decoration:underline;" onclick=ShowHide(1736600);>Show Shuttle Bus Stops</a></b></font><div id="1736600"; style="display:none;"><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=3 rules=rows frame=hsides><tr><td bgcolor=#FAF8CC><b>Station</b><td bgcolor=#FAF8CC><b>Shuttle Bus Stop</b><tr><td>59 St [N]    <td>4 Av at 59 St<tr><td>Bay Ridge Av<td>4 Av at 68 St<tr><td>77 St<td>4 Av at 77 St<tr><td rowspan=2>86 St<td>4 Av at 87 St (to 95 St)<tr><td>4 Av at 86 St (to 59 St)<tr><td>95 St<td>5 Av at 95 St</table></div><br><b><br>
